ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_0: We sent you only to bring good news and to give warning.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_1: Yet We have not sent you but to give good tidings and to warn.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_2: O Muhammad, We have sent you only to proclaim good tidings and to give warning.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_3: We have sent you for no other reason but to be a bearer of glad news and warning.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_4: And We have not sent you (O dear Prophet Mohammed – peace and blessings be upon him) except as a Herald of glad tidings and warnings.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_5: And We have sent you only as a bearer of good news and a warner.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_6: And We have not sent you but as a giver of good news and as a warner.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_7: We have sent thee not, except good tidings to bear, and warning.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_8: And We have sent thee (O Muhammad) only as a bearer of good tidings and a warner.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_9: We have sent you only as a bearer of glad tidings and as a warner.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_10: And We sent thee but as a bearer of glad tidings and warner.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_11: We did not send you except as a bearer of good news and as a warner.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_12: But thee We only sent to give glad tidings and admonition.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_13: And We have sent you (O Muhammad SAW) only as a bearer of glad tidings and a warner.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_14: We did not send you but as a bearer of glad tidings and as a warner.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_15: We sent you only as a herald of good news and a warner.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_16: And We have not sent you, [O Muhammad], except as a bringer of good tidings and a warner.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_17: [25:56] And We have not sent you except as a bearer of good tidings, of Paradise, and as a warner, a threatener [of people] with the [chastisement of the] Fire.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_18: (And We have sent thee) Muhammad to the people of Mecca (only as a bearer of good tidings) Paradise (and a warner) from the Fire.
